title: Ticket #145: CondorPersonal.pm: condorconfig default is wrong
description: /src/condor_scripts/CondorPersonal.pm around line 65 claims that the default for condorconfig is "condor_config". Omitting condorconfig from my paramfile causes StartCondor to attempt to use the directory as a configuration file, not the directory/condor_config. Explicitly setting condorconfig=condor_config yields the expected behavior. Either the comment should be corrected to note that there is no default, or it should work identically "condorconfig = condor_config" in the paramfile.
check_ins: 1999-May-11 15:11   Check-in [5558]: + Renamed CONDOR_choose_ckpt_server to CONDOR_register_ckpt_server. + Only try to register_ckpt_server if not defined(CONTRIB) (as per the problem reported in condor-support #145). (By wright )
creator: adesmet
